name: COVID-19: Against All Odds (DEMO)
description:
Help Pepito Pi, the scientist that has developed the covid vaccine, to annihilate once and for all the COVID-19 disease through a series of platform-based levels with enemies, fights and puzzles.

CONTROLS:

[🡸] and [🡺] to move.
[🡹] to jump.
[Z] to shoot.
[X] to attack.
[Esc] to pause.

Game made by Miquel Comasòlivas Vellisco and Sergi Recasens Alsina for a university project.
